languages.text: "Изначально я предполагал, что мне придется провести расследование и отыскать следы культа Последнего восхода. Думаю, от этого плана уже можно отказаться: и инцидент с мусорным кодом, и манера, в которой пришлось провести высадку на Кьяву Гамма, указывает на то, что ситуация изменилась в худшую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Изначально я предполагал, что мне придется провести расследование и отыскать следы Культа последнего восхода. Думаю, от этого плана уже можно отказаться: и инцидент с мусорным кодом, и манера, в которой пришлось провести высадку на Кьяву Гамму, указывает на то, что ситуация изменилась в худшую сторону".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."
languages.original_text: "Изначально я предполагал, что мне придется провести расследование и отыскать следы культа Последнего восхода. Думаю, от этого плана уже можно отказаться: и инцидент с мусорным кодом, и манера, в которой пришлось провести высадку на Кьяву Гамма, указывает на то, что ситуация изменилась в худшую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我原本计划来这里进行调查，追查终末黎明教派的踪迹。但现在，我感觉不用再考虑这个计划了。无论是遭遇废码的事件，还是在基亚瓦伽马星迫降的事实都在表明，情况已经变得更糟糕了。”
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: “我原本计划来这里进行调查，追查终末黎明教派的踪迹。但现在，我感觉不用再考虑这个计划了。无论是遭遇废码的事件，还是在基亚瓦伽马星迫降的事实都在表明，情况已经变得更糟糕了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Daba por supuesto que podría realizar una investigación para identificar los rastros del Culto del Amanecer Final, pero creo que puedo descartar esa posibilidad: tanto el incidente con el código de chatarra como nuestro aterrizaje en Kiava Gamma indican que la situación se ha complicado».
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: «Daba por supuesto que podría realizar una investigación para identificar los rastros del Culto del Amanecer Final, pero creo que puedo descartar esa posibilidad: tanto el incidente con el código de chatarra como nuestro aterrizaje en Kiava Gamma indican que la situación se ha complicado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は調査を行い、最後の夜明け教団の痕跡を突き止めるつもりでした。その計画は破棄せねばならないようだ。破壊コードの件も、キアヴァ・ガンマへの着陸を余儀なくされたことも、事態が悪い方向に転じたことを示しています」
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: 「我は調査を行い、最後の夜明け教団の痕跡を突き止めるつもりでした。その計画は破棄せねばならないようだ。破壊コードの件も、キアヴァ・ガンマへの着陸を余儀なくされたことも、事態が悪い方向に転じたことを示しています」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich nahm an, ich würde eine Untersuchung durchführen und Spuren des Kults der letzten Dämmerung verfolgen. Diesen Plan kann ich jetzt wohl vergessen: Sowohl der Vorfall mit dem Schadcode als auch die Art und Weise, wie wir zur Landung auf Kiava Gamma gezwungen wurden, deutet darauf hin, dass die Lage sich zum Schlechteren gewandelt hat."
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nahm an, ich würde eine Untersuchung durchführen und Spuren des Kults der letzten Dämmerung verfolgen. Diesen Plan kann ich jetzt wohl vergessen: Sowohl der Vorfall mit dem Schadcode als auch die Art und Weise, wie wir zur Landung auf Kiava Gamma gezwungen wurden, deutet darauf hin, dass die Lage sich zum Schlechteren gewandelt hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je comptais mener l'enquête sur le Culte de l'Aube finale et tenter de retrouver sa trace, mais il semblerait que ce plan soit maintenant caduc. Après cet incident avec l'anticode et notre atterrissage forcé sur Kiava Gamma, tout indique que la situation a empiré. »
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: « Je comptais mener l'enquête sur le Culte de l'Aube finale et tenter de retrouver sa trace, mais il semblerait que ce plan soit maintenant caduc. Après cet incident avec l'anticode et notre atterrissage forcé sur Kiava Gamma, tout indique que la situation a empiré. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın izlerini takip ederek bir soruşturma yürüteceğimi sanıyordum. Zannımca artık o planı bir kenara bırakabilirim. Ne de olsa hurda kodu meselesi ve Kiava Gama'ya iniş yapmak zorunda bırakılmamız, durumun kötüleştiğini gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "I assumed I would conduct an investigation and track down traces of the Cult of the Final Dawn. I believe I can discard that plan now: both the incident with the scrap-code and the manner in which we were forced to land on Kiava Gamma indicate that the situation has taken a turn for the worse."

traits.locale_text: “Nihai Şafak Tarikatı’nın izlerini takip ederek bir soruşturma yürüteceğimi sanıyordum. Zannımca artık o planı bir kenara bırakabilirim. Ne de olsa hurda kodu meselesi ve Kiava Gama’ya iniş yapmak zorunda bırakılmamız, durumun kötüleştiğini gösteriyor.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
